aka: Arvo Pärt - isegi kui ma kõik kaotan
this_title: Arvo Pärt - Even if I lose everything
trans_title: Arvo Pärt - isegi kui ma kõik kaotan
introduction: “Even if I lose everything…, “Arvo Pärt has written in one of his workbooks. What is he talking about?Does it mean that for him, “everything“ has no value any more?Does it mean that there exists something quite different, a treasure, that one may give up “everything” for?What kind of treasure is that?That is what our film is telling about.
chinese_title: Arvo Pärt - Even if I lose everything
